issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client / Neuven User - Booking Details - Renaming Labels

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user when creating a new booking for a direct bank worker – renaming labels -AGENCY WORKERS ONLY

testScript.details:
Given
  • Logged on as a Neuven User with With Manage/Approve/Authorise bookings permission
When
  • On the bookings screen > Manage bookings > Select Location > New Booking
Then
  • If Client Set-Up page for the relevant Client Location has “Agency Workers only” selected
  • Leave headers and labels as they are now

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client / Neuven User - Booking Details - Renaming Labels

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user when creating a new booking for a direct bank worker – renaming labels - Direct Bank Workers only - CREATE

testScript.details:
Given
  • Logged on as a Neuven User with With Manage/Approve/Authorise bookings permission
When
  • On the bookings screen > Manage bookings > Select Location > New Booking
Then
  • If Client Set-Up page for the relevant Client Location has “Direct Bank Workers only” 
  • When Creating a Booking
    • Rename the following labels
      • “Agencies” tab “Booking Distribution”
      • “Agency Name” column header “Worker Source”
      • “Tier” column header "Agency Tier”
      • Rename the label “Please select a Job Type, Start Date and a Rate Type to see agency rates” to “Please select a Job Type, Start Date, and Rate Type to see Agency or Direct Bank Worker rates”

      • “Tier” column header "Agency Tier”
      • Rename the label “Please select a Job Type, Start Date and a Rate Type to see agency rates” to “Please select a Job Type, Start Date, and Rate Type to see Agency or Direct Bank Worker rates”

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client / Neuven User - Booking Details - Renaming Labels

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user When Approving / Rejecting Workers for a booking

testScript.details:
Verify as a NEUVEN user when When Approving for a booking 
Given
  • Logged on as a Neuven User with With Manage/Approve/Authorise bookings permission
When
  • On the bookings screen > Manage bookings > Select Location > Approve bookings List (Pending)
Then
  Rename the following Lables
  • On the Workers Details tab, rename the “Agency Branch” column header “Worker Source”
  • The “Agency Name” column header has been renamed “Worker Source”

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client/Neuven User - Create/Edit Booking Details

testCase.name: Verify that as a NEUVEN user when CREATING a new booking – worker distribution tab – DIRECT BANK WORKERS ONLY

testScript.details:
Given 

  • Logged in as a neuven with Manage/Approve/Authorise bookings permission

When 

  • Creating a new booking > worker distribution tab

Then

  • Worker source column to show ‘'Direct Bank Worker’' as an option to select
  • Agency Tier column will only show agency tiers and for Direct bank workers it will show and ‘'D’' Hardcoded
  • “D” must sort above the Tiers - so always be the first option
  • Location column will show ‘'Local’' hardcoded for the Direct Bank workers
  • Rate column for Direct Bank workers will show rates that have ‘' Direct Bank Worker’' 
  • Select Tick Box 
    1. Ticked
    2. Save and Send

  • Select Tick Box 
    1. Ticked

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client/Neuven User - Approving Bank Workers

testCase.name: Verify the NEUVEN user the Approving Bank Workers page layout

testScript.details:
Given 
  • Given booking has been created and sent to Direct Bank workers
  • Given worker has responded via APP
  • Given Booking status is ‘'Approve Workers’'

When

 Logged in as Neuven user with Manage, approve or authorise bookings permission

Then

  • On the Worker Details Tab
  • All Direct Bank workers who have requested the shift via app will now show along with the agency workers
  • Worker Column will show the Direct Bank worker name
  • Worker Profile column
    1. There will be a ‘'view’' hyperlink which takes the user to the Direct Bank worker profile where they will see all the details of the ‘Direct Bank worker’' - This will be a separate tab, with the original tab still open. 
    2. Once the user has read the DBW profile, they close the tab and return to the original tab where the booking is still open
  • Worker Source will show ‘'Direct Bank Worker’' Hard coded
  • Approve and Reject Tick boxes as usual
  • Approve or Reject buttons

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client/Neuven User - Approving Bank Workers

testCase.name: Verify the NEUVEN user the Approving Bank Workers, Direct Bank worker approved for the Booking

testScript.details:
Given 

  • Given booking has been created and sent to Direct Bank workers
  • Given worker has responded via APP
  • Given Booking status is ‘'Approve Workers’'

When

  •  Logged in as Neuven user with Manage, approve or authorise bookings permission

Then

  • On the Worker Details Tab
  • Direct Bank worker approved for the Booking
  • Notification sent to app and shift moved to confirmed shifts in the app.
  • Notification sent via email to Direct Bank worker 
  • If required number of workers is equal to number of workers accepted booking status will be ‘completed’ otherwise will be ‘pending’

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client/Neuven User - Approving Bank Workers

testCase.name: Verify the NEUVEN user the Approving Bank Workers, Direct Bank worker Rejected for the Booking

testScript.details:
Given 

  • Given booking has been created and sent to Direct Bank workers
  • Given worker has responded via APP
  • Given Booking status is ‘'Approve Workers’'

When

 Logged in as Neuven user with Manage, approve or authorise bookings permission

Then

  • On the Worker Details Tab
  • Direct Bank worker Rejected for the booking
  • Sends Notification to the App

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Booking Upload Template changes

testCase.name: Verify the Direct Bank Worker - Booking Upload Template changes as NEUVEN User

testScript.details:
Verify the Direct Bank Worker - Booking Upload Template changes as NEUVEN User

Given 

  • Logged in as Neuven User with Upload Bookings Permission

When 

  • On the Booking Fulfilment > Bookings Upload page

Then

On the Template Download

  • Template should say on the last column ‘Worker Source by Tier (D/1/2/3/4)'

Bookings Upload Functionality and Validation

  • The last column should now accept 'D' as a value along with previously accepted values
  • the last column should read ‘D/1/2/3’, the uploaded booking will be sent to all tier 1,2 and 3 agencies linked to the client location and Direct Bank workers, who are 
    1. Linked to the Client location
    2. Are approved
    3. Has skills for the Job type of the Booking.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Booking Upload Template changes

testCase.name: Client Verify the Direct Bank Worker - Booking Upload Template changes as CLIENT User

testScript.details:
Given 

  • Logged in as CLIENT User with Upload Bookings Permission

When 

  • On the Booking Fulfilment > Bookings Upload page

Then

On the Template Download

  • Template should say on the last column ‘Worker Source by Tier (D/1/2/3/4)'

Bookings Upload Functionality and Validation

  • The last column should now accept 'D' as a value along with previously accepted values
  • The last column should read ‘D/1/2/3’, the uploaded booking will be sent to all tier 1,2 and 3 agencies linked to the client location and Direct Bank workers, who are 
    1. Linked to the Client location
    2. Are approved
    3. Has skills for the Job type of the Booking.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Worker - Bookings Reports Changes

testCase.name: Verify as a CLIENT user Direct Bank workers – Booking report change

testScript.details:
Given 

  • Logged in as a Client User (Of  a Client that uses Direct Bank Workers) based on client settings with View Reports Permission

When 

  • Reports > Venneu Reports > All Bookings report

Then

  • There should be a column called  Responder Source and should show Agency Name if agency responded and should show as ‘'Direct Bank Worker’' if DBW responded.
  • Columns : Worker , worker ID , Digital Tachograph Card Number , Digital Tacho Expiry Date and payroll ref; should show relevant information from the Direct Bank Worker profile.
  • Filter At the bottom should now be named as ‘Worker Source’ instead of Agency and show Direct Bank worker as an option to filter.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Worker - Bookings Reports Changes

testCase.name: Verify as a NEUVEN user Direct Bank workers – Booking report change

testScript.details:
Given 

  • Logged in as a Neuven User with View or Manage Neuven Reports Permission

When 

  • Reports > Venneu Reports > Bookings Export Report > Select Client

Then 

  • All Bookings Report Columns
  • 'Agency Branch 'should be renamed as ' Worker Source'  and  show as ‘Direct Bank Worker’ if Direct Bank worker responded to the booking
  • ‘Worker’ column will show name of DBW
  • ‘Worker proposed by’ column will show name of the ‘DBW’

issue.summary: Multi-Currency - Neuven User - Agency Worker Upload Template - Add PPS column, UK/Ireland/Both

testCase.name: Verify changes to the agency worker template as a Neuven User.

testScript.details:
Given

  • Logged in as a neuven user with Manage Agencies permission

When

  • Agency > Agency Worker
  • Click Upload Worker
  • Click template download. 

Then

  • The template for agency worker is downloaded 
  • The columns UK/Ireland and both will be added to the template.
  • Add a PPS Number column next to the NI number column.

testCase.name: Verify that a neuven user cant upload a worker who works in the uk without and NI number

Given
  • Logged in as a neuven user with Manage Agencies permission
When
  • User has downloaded and completed the template 
  • They fill it in will all the information compulsory for a worker to work in the UK – apart form the NI number 
Then
  • Agency > Agency Worker
  • Click Upload Worker
  • They upload it, and they are given and error message relating to the lack of NI number .

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven/Client User - Worker Upload page

testCase.name: Verify the changes to the worker upload screen DBW for NEUVEN USERS

testScript.details:
Given

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with Manage Direct Bank Worker Permission 

When 

  • On the Direct Worker Page > Click Upload Worker 

Then

  • A popup will appear
  • The popup will have 2 tabs
  • The worker upload tab and the worker roll back tab. 
  • On the WORKER UPLOAD TAB
    1. Enable users to upload file from their PC. 
    2. Template download button 
    3. ‘upload’ button. 
  • On the WORKER ROLL BACK TAB. 
    1. Enter batch Id text box 
    2. If batch id is valid, it will remove all uploaded direct bank worker details 
    3. If the batch ID in not valid error message will appear stating: ‘Enter Valid Batch ID’

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven/Client User - Worker Upload page

testCase.name: Verify the changes to the worker upload screen DBW for CLIENT USERS

testScript.details:
Given
  • Logged in as a Client User with Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission
When 
  • On the Direct Worker Page > Click Upload Worker 
Then
  • A popup will appear
  • The popup will have 2 tabs
  • The worker upload tab and the worker roll back tab. 
  • On the WORKER UPLOAD TAB
    • Enable users to upload file from their PC. 
    • Template download button 
    • ‘upload’ button. 
  • On the WORKER ROLL BACK TAB. 
    • Enter batch Id text box 
    • If batch id is valid, it will remove all uploaded direct bank worker details 
    • If the batch ID in not valid error message will appear stating: ‘Enter Valid Batch ID’

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client User - Changes to "New Time Attendance" button - Manual entry

testCase.name: Verify the changes to T&A manual entry when selecting a client who is set up for both DBW Only

testScript.details:
Given 
  • Logged in as client user with T&A user permission 
When 
  • On the T&A board
  • Selecting ‘New Time Attendance’
  • The select client location pop up box will appear on screen 
Then
  • Worker dropdown will show both agency workers and DBW’s in below format
    1. Direct Bank worker name - Direct Bank worker - approved - linked to the client location 
    2. When logged in from Tab using T&A QR code scanning function, when manual entry is chosen, the worker dropdown should function the same way

testScript.details:
Given 
  • Logged in as client user with T&A user permission 
When 
  • On the T&A board
  • Selecting ‘New Time Attendance’
  • The select client location pop up box will appear on screen 
Then
  • Worker dropdown will show both agency workers and DBW’s in below format
    • Agency worker name - Agency branch name (Existing functionality)
    • When logged in from Tab using T&A QR code scanning function, when manual entry is chosen, the worker dropdown should function the same way

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client User - Changes to "New Time Attendance" button - Manual entry

testCase.name: Verify the changes to T&A manual entry when selecting a client who is et up for both DBW and agency workers.

testScript.details:
Given 
  • Logged in as client user with T&A user permission 
When 
  • On the T&A board
  • Selecting ‘New Time Attendance’
  • The select client location pop up box will appear on screen 
Then
  • Worker dropdown will show both agency workers and DBW’s in below format
    1. Agency worker name - Agency branch name (Existing functionality)
    2. Direct Bank worker name - Direct Bank worker - approved - linked to the client location 
    3. When logged in from Tab using T&A QR code scanning function, when manual entry is chosen, the worker dropdown should function the same way

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven/Client User - Bank worker profile - View QR code Button

testCase.name: Verify a NEUVEN USER can view the QR code Button on a direct workers profile.

testScript.details:
Given 
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When
  • Direct Bank worker page
  • View a Direct Bank worker details
  • In the user details tab
Then
  • There is a ‘View QR Code’ button on the top right of the screen 
  • When clicked it displays a QR Code for that worker.

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Neuven/Client User - Bank worker profile - View QR code Button

testCase.name: Verify a CLEINT USER can view the QR code Button on a direct workers profile.

testScript.details:
Given 
  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘'View Direct Bank Worker’' or '‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When 
  • Direct Bank worker page
  • View a Direct Bank worker details
  • In the user details tab

Then
  • There is a ‘View QR Code’ button on the top right of the screen 
  • When clicked it displays a QR Code for that worker. 
 
UNO-2473

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client User - T&A Board page - Label changes

testCase.name: Verify that if the client location has ‘Direct Bank Workers Only’ or ‘Both’ toggle on the client setting , no change is made to the T&A board page

testScript.details:
Given
  • Logged in as a Client User (With T&A permission)
  • T&A
  • T&A Board
  • Select Client Location
When 
  • Client location has ‘'Direct Bank Workers Only’' of ‘'Both’' Toggle on in client settings
Then 
Then below labels should be changed
  • The “Agency” column header “Worker Source”
  • The text in the Search box “Search Worker Source”

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client User - T&A Board page - Label changes

testCase.name: Verify the recognition of a scanned QR Code.

testScript.details:
Given 
  • Client User 
When 
  • The QR code is scanned   by a worker to  either clock in or clock out. 
Then
The worker source column should:
  • Show source as Direct Bank worker if it is DBW and name of the DBW in Worker column
  • show source as ‘'Agency Branch Name’' if it is a Agency worker

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client User - T&A Board page - Label changes

testCase.name: Verify that if the client location has ‘Agency Worker Only’ toggle on the client setting, no change is made to the T&A board page

testScript.details:
Given 
  • Logged in as a Client User (With T&A permission)
  • T&A
  • T&A Board
  • Select Client Location
When 
  • Client location has ‘'Agency Worker Only’' Toggle on in the client settings
Then
  • There will be no changes to the existing page

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client User - T&A - T&A Board - Scanning of QR code

testCase.name: Verify that as a Direct Bank Worker the same QR code is displayed int the app as on the website

testScript.details:
Given 
  • A Direct Bank Worker is set up in Venneu.com
  • There is a QR code for that Direct Bank Worker 
  • The Direct Bank Worker has registered in Venneu APP
When 
  • In the worker profile section
  • And the upcoming shift details section 
Then
  • Show the same QR code of that worker

issue.summary: Direct Bank Workers - Client User - T&A - T&A Board - Scanning of QR code

testCase.name: Verify that when a QR code has been scanned in it updates to the T&A board for a client user.

testScript.details:
Given 
  • A Direct Bank Worker is set up in Venneu.com
  • There is a QR code for that Direct Bank Worker 
  • The Direct Bank Worker has registered in Venneu APP
When
  • The QR code is scanned to clock in and out for a shift via tablet
Then
  • Should work the same way it Workers for a Agency worker - except the worker source will be Direct Bank worker
  • These details will show in the T&A board for Client user or Neuven user (With T&A permission) for the locations they are linked to in the T&A Page along side of agency workers if the location question users ‘'both’' types of workers.

When

issue.summary: Auto-Cascade functionality - add functionality to Shift Fulfilment 2 Week view page

testCase.name: Verify the Auto-Cascade functionality on the shift fulfilment page - 2 week view.

testScript.details:
Given 
  • Logged in as a client user with the shift fulfilment permissions 
When 
  • In the shift fulfilment page 
  • When creating or adding a shift 
  • And the auto cascade agency in tiers is shown. 
Then
  • Notifications will go out to the agencies based on the hours specified on client set up table.

issue.summary: Venneu - Agency User - Booking Requests - Manage Requests - do not allow a Worker to be allocated to a shift if their Employment Status (e.g. LTD) is blocked by that Client

testCase.name: Verify A Worker cannot be allocated to a shift if their Employment Status is LTD and LTD is blocked by that Client

testScript.details:
Given
  • Logged in as an agency user with booking request permission
  • The employment status of LTD is blocked by the client.
When
  • Allocating a worker to a booking request
Then
  • A Worker cannot be allocated to a shift if their Employment Status is LTD

issue.summary: Venneu - Agency User - Booking Requests - Manage Requests - do not allow a Worker to be allocated to a shift if their Employment Status (e.g. LTD) is blocked by that Client

testCase.name: Verify A Worker cannot be allocated to a shift if their Employment Status is Sole Trader and Sole Trader is blocked by that Client

  • The employment status of Sole Trader is blocked by the client.
When
  • Allocating a worker to a booking request
Then
  • A Worker cannot be allocated to a shift if their Employment Status is Sole Trader

issue.summary: Venneu - Agency User - Booking Requests - Manage Requests - do not allow a Worker to be allocated to a shift if their Employment Status (e.g. LTD) is blocked by that Client

testCase.name: Verify A Worker cannot be allocated to a shift if their Employment Status is Other and Other is blocked by that Client

testScript.details:
Given
  • Logged in as an agency user with booking request permission
  • The employment status of Other is blocked by the client.
When
  • Allocating a worker to a booking request
Then
  • A Worker cannot be allocated to a shift if their Employment Status is Other

issue.summary: Client User - Shift fulfilment page compliance ticks and approval of worker - Bubble Pop up

testCase.name: Verify the shift fulfilment page change of layout

testScript.details:
Given
  • Logged in as a client user ('Approve workers for shifts') and ('Manage shifts') permission
When
  •  Shift fulfilment page
  • 2-week view
  • With the number displayed in Column 'B' there are two actions
Then
  • Click on the “B” Booked number to see the table that only shows the Approved workers
  • Click on the “Bubble” that shows the unapproved but compliant workers - at the top - and the approved compliant workers at the bottom

issue.summary: Client User - Shift fulfilment page compliance ticks and approval of worker - Bubble Pop up

testCase.name: Verify the shift fulfilment page pop up.

testScript.details:
Given
  • Logged in as a client user ('Approve workers for shifts') and ('Manage shifts') permission
When
  •  Shift fulfilment page
  • 2-week view
  • With the number displayed in Column 'B' there are two actions
Then
  • Click on the “Bubble”
  • The pop up displays the following:
    • Agency branch
    • First name
    • Last name
    • Compliant
    • View docs
    • Date of induction
    • Approve

issue.summary: Client User - Shift fulfilment page compliance ticks and approval of worker - Bubble Pop up

testCase.name: Verify the editable fields in the pop up for clients with ‘Approve workers for shift’ permission

testScript.details:
Given
  • Logged in as a client user ('Approve workers for shifts') and ('Manage shifts') permission
When
  •  Shift fulfilment page
  • 2-week view
  • With the number displayed in Column 'B' there are two actions
Then
  • Click on the “Bubble”
  • The following fields are editable for user who are viewing the page with ‘Approve workers for shift’ permissions 
    • Date of induction 
      • Allow user to enter induction date if it is empty
      • DD/MM/YYYY
    • Approve 
      • When the tick box is ticked, the worker was approved
      • Any compliant worker previously approved for the client will be auto ticked in this view
      • If the tick box is empty, this means that the worker has not been approved before
      • The client can tick to approve a worker from this page
      • If the Complaint field is not ticked, then the approve box cannot be ticked
